nodes.text: A hotel was located on the planet Coruscant. The hotel provided expensive living quarters with high end complimentary liquid refreshments such as Whyren's Reserve Batch Number NN182.

In 0 ABY, several Imperial stormtroopers attempted to capture Rebel operatives and smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca in the hotel who were there for a secret meeting. During the ensuing fighting the hotel and adjacent Landing Platform DDF453-17 caught fire. Solo and Chewbacca escaped in the Millennium Falcon from the stormtroopers who called for backup from arriving Underworld Police officers of the Coruscant Security Force and Imperial TIE Fighters.
